update t_gateway_business_open_detail
business_code_boss = #{businessCodeBoss,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gateway_uuid = #{gatewayUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
open_status = #{openStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select: SELECT d.open_status FROM t_gateway_business_open_detail d,t_gateway_info g where g.gateway_uuid = d.gateway_uuid and g.gateway_password = #{gatewayPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and d.business_code_boss = #{businessCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update t_gateway_business_open_detail set open_status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where gateway_uuid = #{gatewayUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
